english.segment1: I've heard all the stories. I've seen all the signs. Witnessed all the glory, yeah. Tasted all that's fine
english.segment2: Nothing compares. To the greatness of knowing You, Lord. Nothing compares. To the greatness of knowing You, Lord
english.segment3: I see all the people. Wasting all their time. Building up their riches. For a life that's fine
english.segment4: I find myself just living for today. ' Cause I don't know what. Tomorrow's gonna bring. So no matter if I rise or fall. I'll never be alone, oh no
